title: Canadian teens allegedly stole over $4M in crypto by impersonating Coinbase support
description:
Two Canadian teenagers have been apprehended and charged in connection with the theft of $4.2 million in cryptocurrency, according to a report by CBC on July 4. Teens stole $4.2M in BTC, ETH The accused teenagers allegedly stole a substantial amount in Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) by posing as Coinbase support and gaining unauthorized […]

title: Survey reveals Canadians’ willingness to embrace Central Bank Digital Currency
description: A recent survey conducted by WealthRocket found that a significant majority of Canadians are open to the idea of utilizing a central bank digital currency (CBDC). Out of the 1,500 respondents aged 18 and above, approximately 59% expressed interest in embracing a CBDC. However, only 5% demonstrated a high level of willingness, while 25% indicated ... Read more
